name: Neighborhood Painter
description:
Painting the neighborhood is so relaxing...

Until the kids just start throwing balls, ugh. Kids nowadays...

Controls
  • Click on one of the buckets below to choose a color.
  • Click on any part of the house to paint it.
  • Paint the blank house the same as the example house to get points!
  • And, uhhh, don't paint the balls...
Credits
  • Game developed by Oscar Moreno (Asdonaur).
  • Music from the Royalty Free Music Pack Volume 2, by Tim Beek
  • Some sounds used:
    • https://freesound.org/people/14GPanskaValaChristoffer/sounds/420163/
